name: Insurance contracts; punitive damages
text:
§431:10-240    Coverage under any policy of insurance issued in this State shall not be construed to provide coverage for punitive or exemplary damages unless specifically included. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2]
Law Journals and Reviews
  Punitive Damages in Hawaii:  Curbing Unwarranted Expansion.  13 UH L. Rev. 659.
Case Notes
